Name: Secreted Proteins Via GO Annotation And WoLF PSORT For shCTSB Paper
Tools:
Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside extracellularly.
Filter1, tp_easyjoin_tool, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
get_subontology_from, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
get_subontology_from, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
get_subontology_from, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
term_id_vs_term_name, wolf_psort, Removes comment lines at the head of the Uniprot Go database file.
Grep1, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside in lysosomes.
Filter1, Extracts uniprot accessions from all proteins in the input list that are predicted by WolfPsort to be lysosomal and/or extracellular.
Convert characters1, tp_cut_tool, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
get_subontology_from, bg_uniq, filters out all proteins in the input protein list of interest that are annotated as "extracellular region" and "lysosome" and "plasma membrane" excluding "extracellular organelle" and "cytoplasmic side of plasma membrane"
comp1, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
get_subontology_from, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
term_id_vs_term_name, uniprot, tp_sorted_uniq
